plot: Difara's Pizzeria in Midwood, Brooklyn is considered by most to be the best in the city. DIFARA'S is a short profile of the pizzeria and it's owner.
title: DiFara's
plot_es: Difara's Pizzeria in Midwood, Brooklyn is considered by most to be the best in the city. DIFARA'S is a short profile of the pizzeria and it's owner.
